First up, we have @dabit3 showing us how to build a social media app on @LensProtocol 🫂 Tune in Wednesday @ 4:30pm UTC 👉 https://youtu.be/ESu4uSYEi50

entry.title: Receive between $2K - $30K to build out your ideas via the @womenbuildweb3 accelerator program 🔥 The program takes place online, so anyone in the w...
entry.summary: Receive between $2K - $30K to build out your ideas via the @womenbuildweb3 accelerator program 🔥 The program takes place online, so anyone in the world can participate. Applications still open for a short time. Kicks off on Oct 13th! 🛠 WBW3 - BUIDL Accelerator: GM buildoooors, we’re very excited to announce that the application for our accelerator program is NOW LIVE! 🚀 We’re giving out no strings attached grants of $2K - $30K to support innovative engineering projects ✨🧵 More details and application: https://www.womenbuildweb3.com/accelerator
